definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The working curves of heavy water and light water are comparable.
sentences.chinese: 比較了重水和輕水的工作曲線。

sentences.english: Heavy water is chemically the same as regular-light water.
sentences.chinese: 重水在化學成分上與普通水是一樣的。

sentences.english: The real mountains multiply and streams double back real dense willow trees and bright flowers.
sentences.chinese: 真正的山重水複，真正的柳暗花明。

sentences.english: As a moderate there is a choice between normal water , heavy water and graphite.
sentences.chinese: 可以選擇普通的水，重水和石墨作爲減速劑。

sentences.english: Another was a system for rapidly draining the heavy water from around the core.
sentences.chinese: 另一套是一個迅速從內核周圍排出重水的系統。

definition: variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
to vaporize/evaporation/carburetion/氣|气[qi4] transformation in TCM (i.e. transformation of yin yang vital breath)/unvoicing of voiced consonant
deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
